snippet.title: Hang Gliding - VR Experience  [Quest 2]
snippet.description:
Quest 2 port of the classic Unreal Landscape Mountains Showcase.

- Explore a snowy mountain valley on a hang glider. 
- A relaxing flight through this stunning landscape with frozen lakes and forests. 
- Use your body to control the flight like in a real hang glider.
- Use boost rings for a longer flight. 
- Try to find a mysterious crash site.

Available now on the Meta Quest Store (App Lab):
oculus.com/experiences/quest/5739734479414252/

This is a challenging and laborious Quest port of the classic Unreal Landscape Mountains Showcase. 
(With improved VR controls and extreme optimization)
All credits to the talented team at Epic Games related to the original project. 
(The original project (PCVR) is available for free at the Unreal Marketplace.)
